High Performance
19/21

Java is interpreted, thus never as fast as compiled languages, but:

  • Faster than scripting languages such as Perl and TCL
  • Several performance boosts bring Java much closer to C++
    • Just-In-Time compilers (JIT) generate machine code at runtime
    • Sun Hotspot technology in Java2
  • Choice of JVM brand can make a huge difference
  • More of a problem with GUIs (applets/apps) than with server-side Java
What is Java ?
